page.title: 19SEWAGE WORKS IN WILMSLOW
page.content: There are 2 sewage works in the area. The sewage is piped from roads,houses and drains in Alderley_edge and Wilmslow. It goes through a grid which removes tin cans, rags, bottles etc. Grit is pumped off the bottom and into the side tanks.Then it enters two big sediment tanks where air is pumped in and bacteria added. Sludge that remains is treated again then pumped onto farm land. The clean water goes into the brook. { The plant covers a large area.The {machinery is quite old.The building {was modernised in the 1960's. Three {people work there. One enjoys his job {because he has a variety of things to {do. Some times they need life jackets {or breathing apparatus. { {
